text:
‘I have recorded various music tracks and songs personally without using or intention to use them in films or release them for public exploitation’ — Photo: B. Jothi Ramalingam

In a partial relief for film actor Simbu, HC directed him to appear before the Chennai Crime Branch Police for an enquiry and also said that the offences he was charged with were bailable — Page 7
title: No need for bail plea, HC tells Simbu
